intro.title: MAKE A CORRECT MATCH
intro.desc: CAN YOU REBUILD MATER’S DISGUISE BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT? YOU’LL HAVE 3 SECONDS TO MEMORIZE ALL HIS PARTS BEFORE THEY POP OFF. IF YOU CAN REBUILD HIM BEFORE THE BUZZER, YOU WIN!
intro.tip: TIP: CLICK FOR A SNEAK PEAK!

win.title:
FANTASTIC JOB!
YOU MATCHED ALL THE PARTS WITH
${num} SECONDS TO SPARE!
